response.overview: In Summary of the Opera, her most recent clip that bears the title of her last album, Dani builds a narrative that reflects on the obscurity of our time, the so-called "new normal", and, at the same time that she brings us this reality, the clip is loaded with references to the Seventh Seal, a 1957 Swedish film directed by Ingmar Bergman, which, sixty-five years after it was released, is still current and directly inspires the Opera Summary.
response.title: Resumo da Ópera
